cause.description:
Americans for Prosperity Foundation is committed to educating citizens about economic policy and a return of the federal government to its Constitutional limits. AFP Foundation’s educational programs and analyses help policymakers, the media and individual citizens understand why policies that promote the American enterprise system are the best method to ensuring prosperity for all Americans.
1. Cutting taxes and government spending in order to halt the encroachment of government in the economic lives of citizens
2. Removing unnecessary barriers to entrepreneurship and opportunity by sparking citizen involvement
3. Tax and Expenditure Limitations to promote fiscal responsibility.
cause.mission: Educating citizens about economic policy and a return of the federal government to its Constitutional limits.
